alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 29 at 1:33AM MST until December 29 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways, including portions of Interstate 25.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands
